about_the_game:
They say you're a loose cannon, a rogue, a liability, they call you dangerous, insane even, a man on the edge.

They say Paradise is a city beyond help, infested with corruption and crime to the very roots, a city on the brink.

You've been sent on an impossible mission to infiltrate the shadowy criminal organizations inhabiting the seedy underbelly of Paradise. A final chance at redemption for both this city under siege as well as your beleaguered career.

Welcome to the world of UndercoVR! A cutting edge, gritty crime drama built from the ground up for room scale virtual reality. Engage in fierce arcade gunplay, melee combat and vehicular mayhem in a fight for survival and redemption for yourself as well as the city of Paradise.

So you gotta ask yourself one thing, do you have what it takes to face down the deranged gangbangers, mafia enforcers, dirty cops on the take, and pushers who have overrun the city and come out the other side in one piece with your cover and sanity intact?

It won't be easy, if it was they never would have sent you.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent violence, foul language, mild sexual content
